addr: 5810 West Third Street Los Angeles, CA 90036
title: Pablove Shutterbugs Los Angeles Gallery Show
desc: Our annual Pablove Shutterbugs Gallery Show celebrates the work of our students while raising awareness of childhood cancer. With our graduates? photographic vision on display, their families, friends, and fellow art lovers can come together to support the continuation of our program in Los Angeles. All proceeds from the student prints sold through our Gallery Shows directly benefit the Pablove Shutterbugs program, which allows us to continue putting cameras in the hands of kids and teens living with cancer. For questions about sponsorships please?contact our Associate Director of Partnerships and Events, Ashley Lough, at ashleylough@pablove.org or 323.657.5557.? Committee Alia Malley, Francine McDougall, David Reeve,  Leslie Rubinoff, Alan Sartirana, Leslie Thurman, Michele Urton
